title: The Colnago Y1RS Seems to Have Leaked in a Forum Post
content:
Colnago has taken some heat for leaving Tadej Pogačar with no aero bike. It looks like that’s changing with a model called the Colnago Y1RS.

Read the full article at The Colnago Y1RS Seems to Have Leaked in a Forum Post on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
